statement.text: The value of 2 for moderate loss of aeration corresponds to the value of 0 for normal aeration
The value of 0 for normal aeration corresponds to the value of 1 for mild loss of aeration
The mild loss of aeration is ≥3 B lines when the moderate loss of aeration is Multiple coalescent B lines
The value of 1 for mild loss of aeration corresponds to the value of 2 for moderate loss of aeration
The value of 0 for normal aeration corresponds to the value of 3 for severe loss of aeration
The severe loss of aeration is 3 when the mild loss of aeration is 1
The value of 0–2 B lines for normal aeration corresponds to the value of Multiple coalescent B lines for moderate loss of aeration
The value of Multiple coalescent B lines for moderate loss of aeration corresponds to the value of Consolidation for severe loss of aeration
The severe loss of aeration is Consolidation when the normal aeration is 0–2 B lines
The moderate loss of aeration is 2 when the severe loss of aeration is 3
The severe loss of aeration is Consolidation when the mild loss of aeration is ≥3 B lines
The mild loss of aeration is ≥3 B lines when the normal aeration is 0–2 B lines
The value of Consolidation for severe loss of aeration corresponds to the value of 0 for normal aeration
The mild loss of aeration is ≥3 B lines when the moderate loss of aeration is 2
The moderate loss of aeration is 2 when the severe loss of aeration is Consolidation
The value of Multiple coalescent B lines for moderate loss of aeration corresponds to the value of 1 for mild loss of aeration
The value of 2 for moderate loss of aeration corresponds to the value of 0–2 B lines for normal aeration
The mild loss of aeration is ≥3 B lines when the severe loss of aeration is 3
The severe loss of aeration is 3 when the normal aeration is 0–2 B lines
The value of Multiple coalescent B lines for moderate loss of aeration corresponds to the value of 0 for normal aeration
The value of 3 for severe loss of aeration corresponds to the value of Multiple coalescent B lines for moderate loss of aeration
The value of 0 for normal aeration corresponds to the value of ≥3 B lines for mild loss of aeration
The normal aeration is 0–2 B lines when the mild loss of aeration is 1
The mild loss of aeration is 1 when the severe loss of aeration is Consolidation
The value 0 belongs to normal aeration
The value 2 belongs to moderate loss of aeration
The value 0–2 B lines belongs to normal aeration
The value ≥3 B lines belongs to mild loss of aeration
Consolidation is in severe loss of aeration
1 is in mild loss of aeration
Multiple coalescent B lines is in moderate loss of aeration
3 is in severe loss of aeration
The value ≥3 B lines belongs to moderate loss of aeration
3 is in mild loss of aeration
The value Multiple coalescent B lines belongs to mild loss of aeration
The value Consolidation belongs to normal aeration
0 is in severe loss of aeration
0–2 B lines is in moderate loss of aeration
Consolidation is in moderate loss of aeration
The value 0–2 B lines belongs to severe loss of aeration
There are no duplicate values in moderate loss of aeration
Severe loss of aeration has no duplicate values.
All the values in normal aeration are distinct.
Mild loss of aeration has all unique values.
Mild loss of aeration always has the same value.
Severe loss of aeration always has the same value.
Normal aeration always has the same value.
Moderate loss of aeration always has the same value.
